content:
<rule id="3rd-party-30400" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="schedulerx2-worker" groupId="com.aliyun.schedulerx"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="schedulerx2-spring-boot-starter" groupId="com.aliyun.schedulerx"/>
                    </project>                    
                </or>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Scheduler X">
                    <description>The application embeds the Scheduler X framework.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Scheduler X</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
